oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stella Mae correspondence with Mary Mildred Jones, 1944 May 30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mae, Stella
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Stella Mae to Mary Mildred Jones, in which she responds to a letter that Jones had sent to her inquiring about her husband's war experience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Soldiers -- United States -- 20th century -- History; World War, 1939-1945
Jones, Mary Mildred; Mae, Stella
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. World War II correspondence
